## TableCollection.findById() method

Scans the table to find a specific item using it's default id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findById(id: any): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | any | id of the item to find |

<b>Returns:</b>

T \| undefined
